description:
For seriously warm feet when it's seriously cold out. Lightweight, waterproof winter boots keep small toes dry and toasty through snowball fights, slushy walks to school and trips to the ski hill. Heatseeker® insulation provides warmth for the coldest winter days and super-grippy outsoles keep kids upright on slippery sidewalks.

  • Uppers are ballistic nylon for lasting durability
  • Waterproof construction and fully taped seams keep water on the outside
  • Cozy fleece lining with 400g/sqm Heatseeker® insulation keeps little toes warm
  • Pull tabs for easy on and off
  • Bungee collar and Velcro® strap offer a secure fit that keeps snow out
  • Midsoles and lower shells are made of flexible and lightweight thermoplastic rubber
  • TNF Winter Grip® rubber outsole for all-weather traction
name: The North Face Alpenglow Extreme Winter Boots - Children to Youths
